mapper.select: SELECT SEQ ,ID ,NICNAME ,TITLE ,REGDATE FROM C_INQUIRY WHERE IMSI='N'
SELECT A.SEQ,A.ID,A.NICNAME ,A.TITLE,A.CONTENT ,B.REALFILE , A.REGDATE FROM C_INQUIRY A LEFT JOIN "FILE" B ON(A.REALFILE =B.REALFILE ) WHERE A.SEQ=#{seq} AND IMSI='N'
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM C_INQUIRY WHERE SEQ=#{seq} AND IMSI='N'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO C_INQUIRY (SEQ, ID, NICNAME, REGDATE, TITLE, CONTENT,AUTH) VALUES(C_INQUIRY_SEQ.NEXTVAL,#{id},#{nicname},SYSDATE,#{title},#{content},'C')
mapper.select: SELECT A.SEQ, A.NICNAME, A.TITLE, A.REGDATE FROM C_INQUIRY A JOIN REGISTER B ON A.ID=B.ID WHERE A.AUTH='ROLE_S'
SELECT A.SEQ,A.ID,TITLE,CONTENT ,B.REALFILE ,REGDATE FROM C_INQUIRY A LEFT JOIN "FILE" B ON (A.REALFILE =B.REALFILE) WHERE AUTH='S' AND IMSI='N'
